attributes.action: Redirect Nuclear £££BILLIONS - install micro wind/solar generation on millions of homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Support the Microgeneration Bill.
Government pay installation thus getting best price due to volume of order.
Government would own all installations.
If all homes/businesses generate 24/7 then unused power could be fed back into the grid. The government could make invested back by selling this very cheap electricity to people.
All equipment must comply with the WEEE directive so we don't end up creating more landfill.
No terrorist threats on Nuclear plants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
